alert.note: Alert for Northern Black Hills; Northern Foothills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 2:42PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...SHOWERS WITH GUSTY WINDS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN MEADE AND NORTHEASTERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM MST... At 241 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking heavy rain showers with gusty winds 3 miles northwest of Whitewood, or 7 miles east of Spearfish, moving east-southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sturgis and Whitewood around 245 PM MST. Fort Meade around 250 PM MST. Bear Butte State Park around 255 PM MST. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 9 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH

area.areaDesc: Northern Black Hills; Northern Foothills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills
